name: Tom Holkenborg
description:
'''Tom Holkenborg''' (born 8 December 1967), also known as '''Junkie XL''', is a Dutch composer, multi-instrumentalist, DJ, producer, and engineer. Originally known for his trance productions, he has moved to producing electronica and [[big beat]] music and film scores. His remix of [[Elvis Presley]]'s "[[A Little Less Conversation#Junkie XL / JXL remix|A Little Less Conversation]]" became a worldwide hit in 2002.

In film scores, he has worked with [[Hans Zimmer]] and his company [[Remote Control Productions (American company)|Remote Control Productions]] on ''[[Man of Steel (film)|Man of Steel]]'' and ''[[Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice]]'', as well as composing the scores for ''[[Zack Snyder's Justice League]]'', ''[[Divergent (film)|Divergent]]'', ''[[Mad Max: Fury Road]]'', ''[[Deadpool (film)|Deadpool]]'', ''[[Tomb Raider (film)|Tomb Raider]]'', ''[[Alita: Battle Angel]]'', ''[[Terminator: Dark Fate]]'', ''[[Sonic the Hedgehog (film)|Sonic the Hedgehog]]'' (and its sequels), ''[[Scoob!]]'', ''[[Godzilla vs. Kong]]'', ''[[Army of the Dead]]'', ''[[Three Thousand Years of Longing]]'' and ''[[Rebel Moon]]'' as well as ''[[Rebel Moon â€“ Part Two: The Scargiver]]''.
